title.value: Селекция и семеноводство огурца открытого грунта
Selection and seed farming of open ground cucumber

person.name: Khleborodov, A.Ya., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center for Potato, Vegetable and Fruit Growing (Belarus). Institute for Vegetable Growing

abstract.value: In course of the research there were studied theoretical and experimental aspects on breeding and seed varieties and hybrids of cucumber bee pollinated and parthenocarpic types that were resistant to disease. The research was realized in the conditions of the Republic of Belarus. As a result of realized research there were considered the questions of allocation and generation of source material in terms of productivity, parthenocarpy, disease resistance and morphological characters. The dependence of the quality of the fruit and technological properties of morphological and biochemical parameters was defined. The effect of heterosis in variety-line and interline hybrids F1 cucumber was determined. The source material, varieties and hybrids of cucumber with a set of economically important traits that meet the requirements of production at the current stage was presented. The questions of primary seed and technology of cucumber seeds were shown.
